attributes.action: Restore to the Courts the option to impose the Death Penalty for murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to a recent YouGov survey (March 7-11, 2008), 74% of Britons  favour the Death Penalty always or under certain circumstances.

We the undersigned request that this Government, having pledged to be "Tough on crime and tough on the causes of crime", now accede to the wishes of the electorate and grant a referendum to restore to Courts the option to impose the sentence of Capital Punishment for Murder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
